ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Questions on Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: You can NOT stick (or re-stick) charm until your pet breaks the previous charm.  When he is your pet, he is immune to your offense songs, including charm. Tip:
ygData.messageBody:
You can NOT stick (or re-stick) charm until your pet breaks the previous
charm. When he is your pet, he is immune to your offense songs, including
charm.

Tip: charm, selos and move away. Wait for the "your charm is over..."
message before you attempt to re-charm. You can have selos up, see the
"your charm has ended..." message, cast new charm and while its casting -
take advanatge of a powerful bard thing and move away at selos speed thus
avoiding getting hit. Ok, that works good in the karanas but not so good in
the sewers or other confined spaces but you get the idea: you can NOT
re-charm until after your pet breaks charm so move away.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: Adam Wasserman <wassermana@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 10:01 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Questions on Charm


> From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
>
> Hi all,
>
> I've recently aquired the much coveted (by me at least) charm song. I've
> done some limited experimenting, mostly on very light greens so that I can
> get the hang of it, however I'm finding the timing of this song to be
> something I just can't grasp.
>
> Generally I select a target, Charm, swtich targets and attack, Selo's,
Hymn,
> they back to charm.
>
> Unfortunately, I seem to charm too early every single time, the mob breaks
> charm and I get beat on for a full cycle while I try to get charm going
> again.
